headline: Corning Is Poised for Dominance in AI Data Centers. It’s All About the Optics.
summary: The 174-year-old Pyrex maker could become one of the biggest winners from the AI boom thanks to decades of investment in glass research and manufacturing, said analysts.

headline: Corning: A Durable Screen Company, But Overvalued Now
summary: Corning sees growth from AI and solar, but high valuation and display tech headwinds prompt a 'hold' rating. Click here to read an analysis of GLW stock now.

headline: Electric Vehicles Update - Shifting Strategies In A Transforming Auto Industry Landscape
summary: The electric vehicle (EV) sector is experiencing a substantial transformation driven by global supply chain shifts and rising geopolitical tensions. Key developments in the industry involve efforts to mitigate range anxiety through enhanced charging infrastructure and the strategic localization of production facilities to respond to changing trade dynamics. Notably, the evolving landscape is shaped by ambitious government targets and increased tariffs, which are prompting automakers to adapt...
